Title: Requires the posting of information concerning a change in the location of a polling place
Summary: Requires the board of elections for the voting district in which an old polling place is located to post at the entrance of the old polling location a notice informing voters that the polling place has been moved and providing the street address of the new location.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring the posting of information concerning a change in the location of a polling place
